last_episode_to_air.name: The Last Night
last_episode_to_air.overview: Winter may be ending but drama is still in peak season. Marc has to confront Taylar. JBrew grapples with how to handle his girlfriend. A stunning turn of events gives Jill one last chance to discover the real truth about TJ and his open relationship.

name: Winter Break: Hunter Mountain
overview: For one season out of the year, the East Coast becomes the Ice Coast. Serving as a rite of passage for young people who want to get away for a winter break, Hunter Mountain is an idyllic ski resort that offers twenty somethings the chance to escape their regular lives, ski and snowboard their brains out and party with other like-minded singles. On Winter Break: Hunter Mountain, we document the lives of 8 young people who move into a share house for the season – and the impact their winter together has on their lives.

episodes.name: The First Night
episodes.overview: What happens when eight snowboarders shack up in a share house at Hunter Mountain for the winter? Hot tubs, cold drinks, police pop-ins and hospital visits, and that’s just the first weekend!

episodes.name: How Jill Got Her Groove Back
episodes.overview: A spill on the mountain has Jill’s winter vacation in jeopardy. Another visit from the cops and a blow up with JBrew has Alessandra questioning if she wants to stay in the house.

episodes.name: It's Complicated
episodes.overview: Will JBrew and Alessandra ever stop fighting? Will Marc ever hook up with Taylar? And WTF will Jill do after she finds out about TJ’s shocking secret?

episodes.name: The Letter
episodes.overview: A disingenuous tactic leads Taylar to start falling for Marc, while Jill continues to fall for TJ, despite the girls’ warnings. And JBrew’s hardcore shred crew from home comes to wild out at the house. What could possibly go wrong?

episodes.name: The Phone Call
episodes.overview: Marc’s ride on the Taylar rollercoaster takes another dip. JBrew ends up in the hospital. And an unexpected phone call turns Jill’s winter fairy tale into a nightmare.

episodes.name: The Good the Bad and the Ugly
episodes.overview: TJ is having trouble escaping his military past, while Marc is having trouble escaping Taylar.

episodes.name: Fear and Loathing on Hunter Mountain
episodes.overview: Temperatures are dropping and emotions are heating up on the final weekend of the winter, as JBrew breaks down, Jill freaks out, and as reality sets in for TJ when juggling Jill and his girlfriend starts to backfire.

episodes.name: The Last Night
episodes.overview: Winter may be ending but drama is still in peak season. Marc has to confront Taylar. JBrew grapples with how to handle his girlfriend. A stunning turn of events gives Jill one last chance to discover the real truth about TJ and his open relationship.
